REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to siting requirements for the New York city school construction authority's leasing program
Summary: Relates to siting requirements for the New York city school construction authority's leasing program.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to siting requirements for the New York city school construction authority's leasing program
